LanguageData.MovingRail_MustPlaceNextToRail: Industrial pusher must be placed so that: White glow - roller, stockpile or storage building, Aqua glow - roller
LanguageData.MovingRail_MustPlaceBetweenRailAndStockp: Industrial puller must be placed so that: White glow - roller or stockpile, Aqua glow - roller or stockpile
